00090   def _setFirstTimeStep(self, firstTimeStep):
00091 
00092     if not type(firstTimeStep) is types.IntType:
00093       msg = "first timestep argument (%s) of DynamicFramework must be of type int" % (type(firstTimeStep))
00094       raise AttributeError(msg)
00095 
00096     if firstTimeStep <= 0:
00097       msg = "first timestep argument (%s) of DynamicFramework must be > 0" % (firstTimeStep)
00098       raise AttributeError(msg)
00099 
00100     if firstTimeStep > self.nrTimeSteps():
00101       msg = "first timestep argument (%s) of DynamicFramework must be smaller than given last timestep (%s)" % (firstTimeStep, self.nrTimeSteps())
00102       raise AttributeError(msg)
00103 
00104     self._d_firstTimeStep = firstTimeStep

00108

00110       msg = "Current timestep must be > 0"
00111       raise AttributeError(msg)
